data.title: 'Safe port in the storm:' Why investors rewarded Apple but fled its Big Tech peers after earnings

data.title: U.S. tech giants face pressure from Europe's telcos to pay for building the internet
data.description: European telecom groups are demanding firms like Google and Netflix pay them to compensate for the outsized portion of bandwidth they take up on their networks.
